caption.p: Structure superimposition of M pro with peptides (N3 and AZA). (A) Superimposition of 2019-nCoV (6LU7: pink with N3 peptide: yellow) and SARS (2A5K: blue with AZA peptide: green). (B) Molecular binding-site interactions (black) within 4Ã… region; 2A5K (blue) with AZA peptide (green), 6LU7 (pink) with N3 peptide (yellow).
